DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Serum Testosterone Levels Patients With Metastatic Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This 12-week , open-label study abiraterone acetate least 50 patient metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer . The primary endpoint total testosterone pharmacokinetic steady-state . Additional secondary endpoint include safety assessment , PSA pharmacokinetic measurement
